game.name: God Damn The Garden
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The FPS Adventure where you're challenged to explore God Damn's World, and ultimately become the successor of Badass Heaven.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The FPS Adventure where you're challenged to explore God Damn's World, and ultimately become the successor of Badass Heaven.

reviewHighlights.text: Annoying for the sake of being annoying, a few examples below. You can tap left mouse to fire your weapons, or you can hold left mouse to charge up a...
